column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////On behalf of everyone here at Jinya Ramen Bar
column2: we sincerely thank you for your patronage and wonderful review of your experience at Jinya.  Although we are not perfect
column3: we strive to give our customers the best experience possible each and every day.  It's customers like you that keeps us going each and every day in the restaurant business.  Thank you again and we look forward to your future visits at Jinya Ramen Bar!
